def_cn: (用于书、杂志等中指示插图或图表)
def_en: In books and magazines, fig. is used as an abbreviation for (缩略=)figure in order to tell the reader which picture or diagram is being referred to.

def_cn: (用于某些词典和语言学习书中)
def_en: In some dictionaries and language books, fig. is used as an abbreviation for (缩略=)figurative.
